bib.title: On using topic maps for knowledge representation
bib.author: Kazienko, Przemys{\l}aw and Litwin, Magdalena
bib.abstract: The paper contains some detailed information on the topic maps paradigm. An application of enzymes knowledge database–the e-enzyme system is presented as an authors' example of the topic map. Some problems in developing of topic maps are pointed out: manual ontology building, visualization, lack of querying standard and methodology for topic maps design.
bib.booktitle: ISAT 2003 Seminar, Information Systems Applications and Technology
